author: TravisEz13
body:
The Windows PowerShell guid is used for tracing here:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/c1c5344a8897262433141ecbc13bb06ac2c4bbef/src/System.Management.Automation/utils/tracing/TracingGen.cs#L38

It should use the PowerShell Guid from here:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/740d059d517c61f019429fcc11cff18d55ffdf36/src/PowerShell.Core.Instrumentation/PowerShell.Core.Instrumentation.man#L34

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Actually, I think this is WorkFlow code and can be removed.

title: Windows PowerShell Event Provider GUID still in use in Obsolete Code
